title: Bloomberg Markets: PayPal Earnings, AmEx Management Change
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: PayPal Earnings, AmEx Management Change
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Ritter\u0010Payments and Finance Analyst\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing PayPal boosted its adjusted earnings per share forecast for the full year; the guidance beat the average analyst estimate. He also talks about Stephen Squeri taking over as CEO at American Express.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
